'''Rocky Avildsen''' is a [[Local Legend]] found on the path northeast of [[Weeping Willow of the Lake]], [[Erinnyes Forest]].

A treasure map entitled [[Rocky Avildsen's Disappearance]] can be found in a [[Huge Shell]], and leads to his hidden treasure.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Light Punch
|desc_1 = Performs a quick punch with his left hand, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2 = Medium Punch
|desc_2 = Performs a slower but stronger punch with his left hand, dealing '''66% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = Heavy Punch
|desc_3 = Lunges towards the player and punches with his right hand, dealing '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and causing heavy [[knockback]].

|name_4 = Retaliate
|desc_4 = If knocked off his feet, disappears then reappears near the player to launch a '''Heavy Punch''' counterattack. If brought below a certain HP percentage, the counterattack will instead be a '''Meteor Smash'''.

|name_5 = Meteor Smash
|desc_5 = Teleports into the air and smashes down at the player's location, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used after being brought below a certain HP percentage.

|name_6 = Shockwave Smash
|desc_6 = Smashes the ground up to 3 times, launching 1, 2, 4 trails of explosions with each smash respectively. Each explosion deals '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used after being brought below a certain HP percentage.

|name_7 = ATK Boost
|desc_7 = After reaching '''~40%''' of his Max [[HP]], Rocky Avildsen gains a '''40%''' [[ATK]] boost.
}}

==Trivia==
* Rocky Avildsen is a reference to {{w|Rocky Balboa}}, the protagonist of the ''{{w|Rocky (franchise)|Rocky}}'' film series.
** His name is an amalgam of both Rocky's name and that of {{w|John G. Avildsen}}, the director of the first Rocky film.
